review: Despite having a cleaner GUI than the Chromecast, I've experienced video playback issues with Netflix and Hulu Plus. Random intermittent gray screen for a few seconds has been annoying. Problem are not resolved by plugging directly into TV, I'm lucky that it works through my receiver. Additionally, I have not been able to fully experience the full range of audio with the device's limited functionality with receivers.
author: Jacob B Gardner

review: Once I conquered opening the battery compartment for the remote (push REALLY, REALLY HARD as you slide it open), I found the Fire Stick to be very easy to hook up and use.  I have a subscription to Amazon Prime and also Netflix, so there's plenty of things for me to watch.  It would be great if I could get all of the apps I have on my Kindle Fire HD.I've been using the Fire Stick almost every day.
